name: One Final Moment of Clarity
description:
One Final Moment of Clarity is a horror-suspense visual novel, originally submitted for Spooktober VN Game Jam 2022.

CONTENT WARNING: jumpscares, de-realization, nightmares, medical trauma

You are Oliver. A young man in the countryside, meeting the love of his life for the first time.

You are Oliver. Trapped in an endless nightmare from which there is no clear exit. 

You are Oliver, unsure what is real anymore.

When you can't trust your own mind, who can you trust?


• 12k+ words
• Fully voiced dialogue
• Original Soundtrack
• 3D environments 
• Explorable nightmares
